content: h a n g i n g l o o p if you didn t make the loop at the beginning then use 2 75mm needles to cast on 35 stitches cast off again knit-wise double this strip over to make a loop and sew to the back of the stocking secure with a little button then your stocking is finished and ready to hang fig 16 p h o t o s t e p s please note that you can zoom into these pictures on your computer/device in order to see more detail fig 1 fig 2 fig 3 fig 4 fig 5 fig 6 fig 7 fig 8 fig 9 fig 10 fig 11 fig 12 fig 13 fig 14 fig 15 fig 16 © copyright all rights reserved no part of this pattern may be reproduced in any form this pattern is supplied for your personal and non-commercial use only © copyright 2005 j u l i e w i l l i a m s l i t t l e c o t t o n r a b b i t s page 5
